channel.title: I need help , im a newb to bots
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I am very new to scripts/SCAR and botting in general. I have downloaded the SCAR client thing which allows you to bot and such, but i don't know how to do scripts and use them. I don't plan on making scripts, But rather use scripts already made.
How do I get a script to work? Do I copy and paste a script i find here on the forums and put on the clent?
Please help. Your help is greatly appreciated

item.title: I need help , im a newb to bots
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

go to www.moparisthebest.com/smf/ scroll down untill you see something which is called SRL portel, i hope i have informed you enough with this, if you need any further help i would love to help you, tho i cant see the point of helping you… with clicking!!!

Read full topic
item.source: I need help , im a newb to bots

item.title: I need help , im a newb to bots
item.dc:creator: @RS_cheating_4_lyfe RS cheating 4 lyfe
item.description:
@RS_cheating_4_lyfe wrote:

Thank you very much for your help bob. =)

Oh and what is an SRL portal and where can I find that download?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help , im a newb to bots

item.title: I need help , im a newb to bots
item.dc:creator: @Bob_Mrly Bob Mrly
item.description:
@Bob_Mrly wrote:

You copy and paste, or download the ‘.scar’ file that is the attachment to the post. Once in the scar screen drag the crosshair to the rune scape screen, then press Ctrl+Alt+R or the green arrow to run the script. If you look in SCAR tuts there is a tut with pictures by Starblaster100. Also I reccomend checking out the SRL portal, and download that, as that is the best inclue at the moment.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help , im a newb to bots
